mapper.insert:
select SEQ_STUDENT.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into student(student_id,student_no,first_name,middle_name,last_name,email,telephone,status,gender,semester_registered,registered_year,username,create_time,update_time) values(#{studentId},#{studentNo},#{firstName},#{middleName},#{lastName},#{email},#{telephone},#{status},#{gender},#{semesterRegistered},#{registeredYear},#{user.userName},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET STUDENT.STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo}, STUDENT.FIRST_NAME = #{firstName}, STUDENT.MIDDLE_NAME = #{middleName}, STUDENT.LAST_NAME = #{lastName}, STUDENT.EMAIL = #{email}, STUDENT.TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, STUDENT.STATUS = #{status}, STUDENT.GENDER = #{gender}, STUDENT.SEMESTER_REGISTERED = #{semesterRegistered}, STUDENT.REGISTERED_YEAR = #{registeredYear} WHERE STUDENT.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.STUDENT_ID, s.SEMESTER_REGISTERED, s.REGISTERED_YEAR, s.STUDENT_NO, s.FIRST_NAME, s.MIDDLE_NAME, s.LAST_NAME, s.EMAIL, s.TELEPHONE, s.STATUS, s.GENDER, e.DEGREE, e.MAJOR, e.GPA, e.INSTITUTION, e.COUNTRY, e.GRADUATION_DATE, w.COMPANY, w.TITLE, w.DUTIES, w.DATES FROM STUDENT s, EDUCATION e, WORK w WHERE s.STUDENT_ID = e.STUDENT_ID AND s.STUDENT_ID = w.STUDENT_ID AND s.username = #{userName}
